data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kun, Marcelo E., Martínez, Pablo A., Gonzalez, Alda (2010): Oribatid mites (Acari: Oribatida) from Austrocedrus chilensis and Nothofagus forests of Northwestern Patagonia (Argentina). Zootaxa 2548: 22-42, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.196766
